info.description: The Businesses service provides operations for managing business information, including apps, APIs, workflows, and other information relating to a specific business on the platform. Note that most of these operations take the Business ID as a parameter. To find out what the Business ID is for your installation, you can run the GET /api/properties operation (TenantBusinessID parameter in the response).
info.title: Business API

parameters.name: Federation
parameters.description: Indicates whether the current implementation is a federation. If not specified, defaults to false.

parameters.name: businessID
parameters.description: The unique ID for a specific business on the platform.

parameters.name: IncludeBusinessAPISettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's API settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeBusinessAppSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's app settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeBusinessGroupSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's group settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeTicketSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's ticket settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeConnectionSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's connection settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeDiscussionSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's discussion settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeReviewSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's review settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeAlertSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's alert settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeCommentSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's comment settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeUserSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, the business's user settings are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeBusinessSettings
parameters.description: If set to true, general settings for the business are included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeBusinessCategories
parameters.description: If set to true, model categories for the business are included in the results.

get.description:
Returns the types of businesses (organizations) available in the system. By default no avatars are returned. To include avatars use the IncludeAvatars query parameter.

Request:

GET /businesses/types?IncludeAvatars=true HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/vnd.soa.v83+json

Response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

{
  "BusinessType" : [ 
    {
      "Name" : "company",
      "AvatarURL" : "http://host:port/path"
    },
    {
      "Name" : "department",
      "AvatarURL" : http://host:port/path"
    }
  ]
}

parameters.name: IncludeAvatars
parameters.description: Optional boolean query parameter that if true will return avatar links with each type. Default is false.

get.description:
Returns the information about a given business type including its avatar.

Request:

GET /businesses/types/company HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/vnd.soa.v83+json

Response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

{
  "Name" : "company",
  "AvatarURL" : "http://host:port/path"
}

Returns the summary information of businesses within a given parent business. If no parent is specified the businesses at the root level of the hierarchy are returned.

Request:

GET /businesses?BusinessID=12770263-e036-4222-b8eb-87d33676d3ad.acmepaymentscorp HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/vnd.soa.v83+json

Response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK

{
   "BusinessID" : "12770263-e036-4222-b8eb-87d33676d5fe.acmepaymentscorp",
   "Name" : "Engineering Department",
   "Description" : "Engineering department.",
   "Created" : "2014-07-18T15:43:09Z",
   "Updated" : "2014-07-18T15:44:51Z",
   "Visibility" : "Public",
   "AvatarURL" : "http://{hostname}/api/businesses/12770263-e036-4222-b8eb-87d33676d5fe.acmepaymentscorp/avatar",
   "Parent" :
     {
       "title" : "ACME Organization",
       "href" : ""http://{hostname}/api/apis/12770263-e036-4222-b8eb-87d33676d3ad.acmepaymentscorp/avatar"
     }
   }
}

parameters.name: Federation
parameters.description: Indicates whether the current implementation is a federation. If not specified, defaults to false.

parameters.name: BusinessID
parameters.description: An optional unique ID for a specific business on the platform. If not specified, defaults to the root business. Only direct child businesses are returned.
